de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im

Interface GlobalHandshakeRetryListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultClientFacade, GlobalHandshakeRetryProxy

    public interface GlobalHandshakeRetryListener
    Generic listener for global handshake retry requests from IM(C/V).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void requestGlobalHandshakeRetry(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.enums.ImHandshakeRetryReasonEnum reason)
      Requests a global handshake retry for all current connections with the given reason.

    • Method Detail

      • requestGlobalHandshakeRetry

        void requestGlobalHandshakeRetry(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.enums.ImHandshakeRetryReasonEnum reason)
                                 throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException
        Requests a global handshake retry for all current connections with the given reason.
        Parameters:
        reason - the reason for the request
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if handshake is not acceptable
